name: The Fathomless Fall
description:
The Fathomless fall is a competitive game that gives the most fun and challenge in your way to be the top one in the leader-board.

How to play:

- Falling on platforms that doesn't affect player's health by moving left and right.

Characters and Features:
- There is various of characters and each one has his own abilities.

Challenge?:

- there is various platforms and obstacles.

- the game speed will increase slightly.

Note:

-you need internet connection for the game to work properly.

ENJOY!.......BE ON TOP!
